ARABIC: وَمَن يَعْشُ عَن ذِكْرِ ٱلرَّحْمَٰنِ نُقَيِّضْ لَهُۥ شَيْطَٰنًا فَهُوَ لَهُۥ قَرِينٌ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: If someone shuts his eyes to the remembrance of the All-Merciful, We assign him a shaytan who becomes his bosom friend -
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: We shall attach to him who goes blind to the remembrance of Ar-Rahman a devil as companion, --
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: He who is negligent to remember the Merciful One, to him We assign a satan as his boon companion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: We shall make satan the companion of whoever ignores the remembrance of the Beneficent God.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And whoever is averse to the Remembrance of the Most Gracious, We appoint a devil upon him, who stays with him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: And whosoever Ya`shu (turns away blindly) from the remembrance of the Most Gracious, We appoint for him Shaytan to be a Qarin (a companion) to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And whoever turns himself away from the remembrance of the Beneficent Allah, We appoint for him a Shaitan, so he becomes his associate.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Whoso blinds himself to the Remembrance of the All-merciful, to him We assign a Satan for comrade;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And he whose sight is dim to the remembrance of the Beneficent, We assign unto him a devil who becometh his comrade;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: As for one who turns away from the remembrance of the Gracious God, We appoint for him a devil, who will become his intimate companion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And whosoever blindeth himself to the admonition of the Compassionate, We assign Unto him a Satan, and he becometh his companion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: We assign a devil to be the companion of him who turns a blind eye to the remembrance of the All-beneficent.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: If anyone withdraws himself from remembrance of (Allah) Most Gracious, We appoint for him an evil one, to be an intimate companion to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: And whosoever turns away (blinds himself) from the remembrance of the Most Beneficent (Allah) (i.e. this Quran and worship of Allah), We appoint for him Shaitan (Satan - devil) to be a Qarin (an intimate companion) to him.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: To whosoever blinds himself from the Remembrance of the Merciful, We shall assign him a satan so he is his companion,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Whoever shuns the remembrance of the Most Gracious, We assign for him a devil, to be his companion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And whoever is blinded from remembrance of the Most Merciful - We appoint for him a devil, and he is to him a companion.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [43:36] And whoever withdraws from, [whoever] is oblivious, to the Remembrance of the Compassionate One, namely, the Qur’ān, We assign, We produce, for him a devil and he becomes his companion, never leaving his side.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: 568 (And he whose sight is dim to the remembrance of the Beneficent) and he who is blind to the declaration of the divine Oneness and Scripture of the Beneficent, (We assign unto him a devil who becometh his comrade) in the life of the world and in the Fire;
